title: Text of a Letter from the President to the Chairmen of Certain Congressional Committees and Congressional Leadership on the National Strategy to Combat Terrorist Travel – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
December 21, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1908 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2017 (Public Law 114-328), I have enclosed the classified National Strategy to Combat Terrorist Travel.
Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
